title: ISic001777. I.Sicily inscription 001777
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΑΠΟ[---]
2Η[---]
3·[---]

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Orsi 1893;
  • 3: Orsi records trace of a vertical

English translation

commentary

The fragment appears intact above and to the left, from Orsi's drawing; what appears to be the trace of the left handle of a tabula ansata is depicted below the preserved letters.

bibliography

  • Orsi 1893 292 no. 58a https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001715
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
